text: ni parayuka: allahuvin purame ninnal viliccu prart'thikkunna ninnalute pankalikale parri ninnal cinticcu neakkiyittuntea? bhumiyil enteannanavar srsticcittullatenn ninnal enikk kaniccutarika. atalla, akasannalil avarkk valla pankumuntea? atalla, nam avarkk valla granthavum nalkiyitt atil ninnulla telivanusariccanea avar nilakeallunnatâ€Œ? alla akramakarikal an'yean'yam vagdanam ceyyunnat vancana matramakunnu
